Getting Started

  • Base URL 
    http://car1.hack.att.io
  • REST server running port 
    3000
  • Web server running 
    80
    so you have two pages
    • Api documentation and REST test client: 
      http://car1.hack.att.io/hackathon-portal


For information on the hackathon, visit the AT&T Connected Car Hackathon information page.
